# Rebus Live Peers
Here is a script for you to update `persistent_peers` setting with these peers in `config.toml`.

```
peers="40e2c0b68a1dd48466714e3dd0581e4b7d498575@107.155.122.93:26656,1bdbfe0a91638d467dc4915da813e3016410c2d2@176.9.10.239:26656,e04e8466071f8f00defce1d45c27ca6118bac358@135.125.4.73:54556,529b1bc09b6d89d9e300df22a48517223b13180c@135.181.219.115:31656,27773217f7d95b8269afdc066dd75367e736cc86@52.90.79.31:26656,94b63fddfc78230f51aeb7ac34b9fb86bd042a77@49.12.132.167:30543,3a378fbfae33a593b913371c876c9d275c0abb12@213.239.215.77:26656,ca857f27072045eb6504ef49cb9b27e8b9f8e750@167.235.130.150:26656,eed167300ca32630b089f09a7f34a381c5dcba7c@139.180.210.89:26656,04e361aa284cac8067c2dc8a119265da77a835ef@148.251.1.124:22656,554c1b38a7662ed217261a5d766a7cdd8a18917b@38.242.234.72:26656,69e27ab9b46350654805df3ea8d9ac2f00af4e4c@38.242.244.85:26656,237bfc05da5f8cabee00f148995333f37186d232@164.68.121.101:26656,c0b33353fb70d8d71dcb9c8848b3b4207bd56951@94.23.207.45:30547,011a80b75d4986be1c71267785341e172d4aa321@198.244.228.17:33656,9abd6680cf74fce2ade8edfd8a898dd4a927a425@38.242.242.99:30656,f97a11f283cd5f11bf1fe73d8b2012b711d61ce9@38.242.205.80:21656,17779ded6b3dc2f31d6c6f40cc6f07d802753ba7@78.47.153.128:26656,c126eed9cfede7802d78f570fec8175835309a73@141.95.127.146:26656,5f29f14fe3dd7e1d86caa4d344e67ee81c32255f@65.109.37.228:26656,4a4d2e7070e05ad6c13628d2f191d96172659452@65.109.65.210:40656,b570827e4397512e077028ea7121d3e19eb25bab@85.10.200.221:26656,b8613a7717b0ebaf2100c360cf13c92c4de33100@195.201.63.87:41666,3e319c765b7b48d518a2e3218efc317234b81681@142.132.159.188:26656,d28516746773bfaeca4efa5537c0bf5990b8828e@65.21.229.33:27656,6daeb8cfea285f561e167a0d94718b61e2cf7944@5.189.187.36:21656,5a13200e67f6cb5385d9d8f8c68a7b5e62f8cd54@188.34.176.96:26656,6ac55af662061d3669d7c70961a8fd87ba2f2075@65.108.200.142:26696,f339d2999792b360797d4e22dfd40c0ea4b7402e@51.68.173.153:26656,e1c9e76dad377c46322ba32b0d5edc261cac6e69@212.8.240.13:21656,5c2018214fcfde67ec390702539f295165f12a3a@86.48.2.20:26656,49e084a4c77f168810608e20b530ee9d25ac69b7@209.126.8.176:26656,755da71a0d5158c8ac05ed0e6f9506644dc9302
```
